mosparams.description: Description definitions for a query object.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: General Language Settings
param.description: These settings determine what and how descriptions will appear to describe a variable.

param.name: GENERAL_DESCRIPTION
param.label: General Description
param.description: A description of the variable that will appear on the form view.

param.name: DEFAULT_LANGUAGE
param.label: Default Language
param.description: The language in which these descriptions are written. If no value is specified, the Joomla default is used.

param.name: GENERAL_DESCRIPTION_LANG_CODE
param.label: Description Language Code
param.description: This language code will be used when the user's language is not the language defined above.

param.name: DISPLAY_NAME_LANG_CODE
param.label: Language Code
param.description: This language code will be used to display the name of the query when the user's language is not the query's language.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Alternative Text
param.description: Using the following parameters, you can define alternative texts for variables.

param.name: INPUT_COMMENT_TEXT
param.label: Text for Input Comment
param.description: This text will describe what input is expected.

param.name: INPUT_COMMENT_LANG_CODE
param.label: Language Code for Input Comment
param.description: This language code will be used when the user's language is not the language defined above.

param.name: INPUT_INVALID_TEXT
param.label: Text for Invalid Input
param.description: This text will appear when the user has submitted invalid input.

param.name: INPUT_INVALID_LANG_CODE
param.label: Language Code for Invalid Input
param.description: This language code will be used when the user's language is not the language defined above.
